price: па нам је Аллах даровао милост и сачувао нас од патње у Огњу.
arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: famanna al-lahu ʿalaynā wawaqānā ʿadhāba al-samūmi
